    • modifyRoundAndActionList

      public void modifyRoundAndActionList() throws Exception
      Modifies the round for the next Players actions. If none of the players have done the selection, set as next action the selection for the next player. Else if everybody did it, pass to the next Action.
      Specified by:
      modifyRoundAndActionList in class Action
      Throws:
      Exception - if something bad happens
